name: Jigsaw Challenge
description:
Jigsaw Puzzle Game for Windows.

Required Resolution: 1600x900 or more.
Features:

- 150 Tile Puzzles

- 24 colorful motives

- very simple-very difficult motives

- Tile snapping function

- Image can be activated in background in solid or transparent.

This is a Demoversion. If you have any feedback please let us know in the comments.
